name: Lighthouse Solar
overview:
Lighthousesolar is a solar services company offering solar electric solutions for residential and commercial customers, and whose mission is to facilitate the use of clean, free and renewable solar energy.

Since 2006, we have been facilitating the use of clean, free, and unlimited solar energy by providing solar electric solutions to residential and commercial customers. We make it simple for our customers by handling the entire installation process from custom design through system commissioning.

Our Technical Sales Engineers will work with you to determine your solar energy requirements and capabilities. They will continue managing your project until your system is fully commissioned and producing clean energy. By working with one point of contact you will receive the personal service and accountability you deserve.

Keeping our customers happy by providing professional and courteous service is one of the reasons for our success. Our reputation for quality service has allowed us to grow throughout the country and continue to add to our base of satisfied customers. We understand that your home or business is not a construction zone and we will respect your schedule and leave our work area clean. Every Lighthouse employee is professionally trained and held to the highest industry standard.

When you engage Lighthouse Solar to provide you with a bid on a solar energy system you can trust that your bid will be accurate. We stand behind the integrity of our estimates by offering one fixed price with no hidden costs, so you will rest easy knowing that there will be no upward price adjustments to what you were originally promised.

external_links.title: Colorado City to Save Nearly $500,000 by Using Solar
